title: La Poulette grise (TEFC)
brief_description: Presentation in cartoon form by Norman McLaren of an old French-Canadian folk song. Anna Malenfant sings the traditional French-Canadian song about the little grey hen who nests in the moon, the words of the song being illustrated by animated forms.
